com.heiman.mqttsdk.smartlink.esptochsdk.util

类 ByteUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.heiman.mqttsdk.smartlink.esptochsdk.util.ByteUtil

  • public class ByteUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    In Java, it don't support unsigned int, so we use char to replace uint8. The range of byte is [-128,127], and the range of char is [0,65535]. So the byte could used to store the uint8. (We assume that the String could be mapped to assic)
    作者:
    afunx

      • putString2bytes

        public static void putString2bytes(byte[] destbytes,
                                   java.lang.String srcString,
                                   int destOffset,
                                   int srcOffset,
                                   int count)
        Put String to byte[]
        参数:
        destbytes - the byte[] of dest
        srcString - the String of src
        destOffset - the offset of byte[]
        srcOffset - the offset of String
        count - the count of dest, and the count of src as well

      • convertUint8toByte

        public static byte convertUint8toByte(char uint8)
        Convert uint8 into char( we treat char as uint8)
        参数:
        uint8 - the unit8 to be converted
        返回:
        the byte of the unint8

      • convertByte2Uint8

        public static char convertByte2Uint8(byte b)
        Convert char into uint8( we treat char as uint8 )
        参数:
        b - the byte to be converted
        返回:
        the char(uint8)

      • convertBytes2Uint8s

        public static char[] convertBytes2Uint8s(byte[] bytes)
        Convert byte[] into char[]( we treat char[] as uint8[])
        参数:
        bytes - the byte[] to be converted
        返回:
        the char[](uint8[])

      • putbytes2Uint8s

        public static void putbytes2Uint8s(char[] destUint8s,
                                   byte[] srcBytes,
                                   int destOffset,
                                   int srcOffset,
                                   int count)
        Put byte[] into char[]( we treat char[] as uint8[])
        参数:
        destOffset - the offset of char[](uint8[])
        srcOffset - the offset of byte[]
        count - the count of dest, and the count of src as well

      • convertByte2HexString

        Convert byte to Hex String
        参数:

        返回:

      • convertU8ToHexString

        public static java.lang.String convertU8ToHexString(char u8)
        Convert char(uint8) to Hex String
        参数:
        u8 - the char(uint8) to be converted
        返回:
        the Hex String

      • splitUint8To2bytes

        public static byte[] splitUint8To2bytes(char uint8)
        Split uint8 to 2 bytes of high byte and low byte. e.g. 20 = 0x14 should be split to [0x01,0x04] 0x01 is high byte and 0x04 is low byte
        参数:
        uint8 - the char(uint8)
        返回:
        the high and low bytes be split, byte[0] is high and byte[1] is low

      • combine2bytesToOne

        public static byte combine2bytesToOne(byte high,
                                      byte low)
        Combine 2 bytes (high byte and low byte) to one whole byte
        参数:
        high - the high byte
        low - the low byte
        返回:
        the whole byte

                                      byte low)
        Combine 2 bytes (high byte and low byte) to
        参数:
        high - the high byte
        low - the low byte
        返回:
        the char(u8)

                                          int offset,
                                          int count)

      • parseBssid

        public static java.lang.String parseBssid(byte[] bssidBytes)
        parse "24,-2,52,-102,-93,-60" to "18,fe,34,9a,a3,c4" parse the bssid from hex to String
        参数:
        bssidBytes - the hex bytes bssid, e.g. {24,-2,52,-102,-93,-60}
        返回:
        the String of bssid, e.g. 18fe349aa3c4

      • getBytesByString

        public static byte[] getBytesByString(java.lang.String string)
        参数:
        string - the string to be used
        返回:
        the byte[] of String according to ESPTOUCH_ENCODING_CHARSET

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
